name: Where am I ? (Pujan-DEV)
description:
Hello guys this is the game for  TRIJAM #153  game Jam it take almost 3-4 hours 

including art and polishing all the items . This was my first game jam.

It take more time then i thought and i got  the chance to learn so much 

So thank you Trijam and also please Give the report of the bugs i will try to solve them after the Jam
